text: (nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “niyata vasayenma magedeviyan tama vahalungen taman kæmati ayata (jivanopayata avasya)vastuva vistiranaya karanneya. (taman kæmættanta) simitavadenneya. ebævin oba kumak danamana vasayen dunnada, eyata anivaryayenma pratiphala laba denneya. danamana karannangen itamat usasvantaya ohuya”
